name: Moon's medication - Year
description:
A play on my "Moon's meditation" series.

Stop-motion, handmade, repurposed, pixel art.

By collecting Moon's medication - Year on primary, you can support one year's worth of my prescription, or more.

Each frame from this series consists of photos of meticulously hand-arranged 'pixels' - i.e my anti-depressant pill foils (most of which are painted on the inside with acrylic paint) - on a background made of a collage of the medication inserts and painted over. 

Whilst this work is not meant to be a way to cover medical expenses, it is meant to be a reflection upon mental health, waste, value, and poetry upon utility.

artist: @mumu_thestan
materials: pill foils, acrylic paint, medication insert papers
1920x1920, 36 frames, 30fps
